thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 54 of 1961
thread.title: Martin Davis

author: Martin Davis
title: Martin Davis
text: Blow out Saturday night 100 miles from home. Couldn't use a spare because (as with lot of models now). It didn't come with one. Recovered to hotel destination. Tyresonthedrive came next day (Sunday) to hotel and fitted promptly within allocated slot. The fitter (Mark) did an excellent job. I had never heard of them before and would never have used them but for this incident forcing to try and locate someone who would (a) do it on a Sunday and (b) where I wanted it done. However now I have used them will definitely do so again as price really good too.
